title.value: Advancing EDGE Zones to identify spatial conservation priorities of tetrapod evolutionary history
title.justification: The title clearly states the primary focus and contribution of the paper, which is on advancing EDGE Zones to prioritize conservation for tetrapods.
title.quote: Advancing EDGE Zones to identify spatial conservation priorities of tetrapod evolutionary history

extractions.description: This paper maps the evolutionary history of tetrapods to identify priority conservation zones, termed "EDGE Zones." It addresses the biodiversity crisis by detailing areas with significant threatened evolutionary history, using the updated EDGE2 methodology to emphasize the protection of unique species diversity.

type.justification: The paper involves extensive data collection and empirical analysis to map the evolutionary history and determine conservation priorities.
type.quote: We mapped the distributions of 2937 EDGE tetrapod species...

name.justification: The paper primarily deals with conservation strategies for protecting evolutionary history amidst biodiversity crises.
name.quote: The biodiversity crisis is pruning the Tree of Life...

name.justification: It incorporates evolutionary distinctiveness and threatened evolutionary history in conservation planning.
name.quote: We therefore present threatened evolutionary history mapped for all tetrapod groups...

name.value: IUCN Red List of Threatened Species
name.justification: The dataset provides species distribution data used in the analysis.
name.quote: We obtained species distribution data from the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species (Version 2021.1) for terrestrial and freshwater mammals and amphibians.

referenced_paper_title.value: The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2021-1.
referenced_paper_title.justification: The Red List version is cited as a main data source for species distribution.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Species distribution data was obtained from the IUCN Red List of Threatened Species (Version 2021.1).

name.justification: Provides bird species distribution data for analysis.

referenced_paper_title.value: Bird species distribution maps of the world. Version 2020.1
referenced_paper_title.justification: This version is referenced for data on bird distributions.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Data for birds obtained from BirdLife International (Version 2020.1).
